Welcome to SuperSurf

Thanks for installing. Let's get you set up.

Set Up the MCP Server

The extension needs a local MCP server to receive commands from your AI agent.

1

Register with Claude Code

claude mcp add supersurf -- npx supersurf-mcp@latest
2

Or add to Claude Desktop config

{
  "mcpServers": {
    "supersurf": {
      "command": "npx",
      "args": ["supersurf-mcp@latest"]
    }
  }
}

Works with any MCP-compatible client — Claude, GPT, Gemini, or your own.

3

Start automating

Your agent calls the enable tool to start a session. The extension auto-connects and 30+ browser tools become available.

What You Get

Everything your AI agent needs to operate a real browser.

•

30+ browser tools — navigation, clicks, typing, screenshots, network monitoring, form filling, CSS inspection, PDF export, and more.

•

Undetectable — all DOM interaction runs through Chrome's content script isolated world. Page JavaScript can't observe it.

•

Real browser profile — your cookies, history, localStorage, and extensions are all present. No sterile headless environment.

•

Secure credentials — passwords are resolved from environment variables extension-side. Your agent never sees raw values.

View on GitHub npm package Documentation

SuperSurf is 100% open source — every line of code is on GitHub.
